basic.name: Basic Plan
basic.description: Perfect for newcomers and small brokers stepping into global oil trading

_broker_removed._comment: Broker is a MEMBERSHIP (broker_memberships table), not a subscription plan. Access is controlled via requires_broker_membership flag on templates and broker_memberships table.
_broker_removed._note: This entry is kept for reference but should not be used. Broker access is checked via check_broker_membership_status RPC function.
